document.full_text: a federal appeals court ordered a new sentencing hearing for mumia abu-jamal, a convicted police killer, finding for a second time that the death-penalty instructions given to the jury at his 1982 trial were potentially misleading.
document.title: mid-atlantic: pennsylvania: new sentencing in officer's killing
lines_and_colors: a federal appeals court ordered a new sentencing hearing for mumia abu-jamal, a convicted police killer, finding for a second time that the death-penalty instructions given to the jury at his 1982 trial were potentially misleading.
